Class BaseCertGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.generator.BaseCertGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorizationCertGenerator, BaseAuthorityCertGenerator, EnrollmentCertGenerator, ETSIAuthorizationTicketGenerator, ETSIEnrollmentCredentialGenerator

    public abstract class BaseCertGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Base CertGenerator class containing common methods.
